com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class HtmlToXMLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.HtmlToXMLUtil

  • public final class HtmlToXMLUtil
extends Object
    This utility class provides a mechanism to ensure HTML is XML valid. It does this by unescaping HTML entities but not unescaping valid XML entities: &lt;, &gt;, &quot;, &apos; and &amp;.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Mark Reeves

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.apache.commons.lang3.text.translate.CharSequenceTranslator UNESCAPE_HTML_TO_XML
      The translator to unescape HTML entities and the (invalid) &apos; to valid XML.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String unescapeToXML(String input)
      Unescape HTML entities to safe XML.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • UNESCAPE_HTML_TO_XML

        public static final org.apache.commons.lang3.text.translate.CharSequenceTranslator UNESCAPE_HTML_TO_XML
        The translator to unescape HTML entities and the (invalid) &apos; to valid XML. This is based on the apache-commons StringEscapeUtils UNESCAPE_HTML4 translator with the BASIC_UNESCAPE Entity array removed and the APOS_UNESCAPE Entity array added.

    • Method Detail

      • unescapeToXML

        public static String unescapeToXML(String input)
        Unescape HTML entities to safe XML.

        Example

         StringEscapeHTMLToXMLUtil.unescapeToXML("&bull;&Dagger"); // returns "•‡"}
 StringEscapeHTMLToXMLUtil.unescapeToXML("&lt;p&gt;"); // returns "&lt;p&gt;" not "<p>"
        Parameters:
        input - The String to unescape.
        Returns:
        the input with all HTML4 character entities unescaped except those which are also XML entities.
